name: generate-roam-site-lambda
description: AWS Lambda Function generating and deploying Roam graphs as public sites

scripts.postbuild: cd out && zip -rq deploy.zip ./deploy.js ./node_modules/* && zip -rq launch.zip ./launch.js && zip -rq shutdown.zip ./shutdown.js && zip -rq origin-request.zip ./origin-request.js && zip -rq complete.zip ./complete.js

author: dvargas92495 <dvargas92495@gmail.com>
